meanings.definition: Unscrupulousness: the quality of being dishonest or unethical
meanings.sent1: His unscrupulousness in business dealings led to many people losing trust in him.
meanings.sent2: The company's downfall was a result of the unscrupulousness of its executives.
meanings.sent3: The unscrupulousness of the character in the movie made everyone root for the hero.
meanings.sent4: Her unscrupulousness was like a dark cloud hanging over the otherwise honest team.
meanings.sent5: The unscrupulousness of the politician was exposed by investigative journalists.

meanings.sent1: The unscrupulousness behavior of the con artist fooled many unsuspecting victims.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her unscrupulousness when it came to achieving her goals.
meanings.sent3: The unscrupulousness of the cat stealing food from the dog was both amusing and sneaky.
meanings.sent4: His unscrupulousness was a sharp contrast to his brother's unwavering integrity.
meanings.sent5: The unscrupulousness of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
